snippet: Anthony Davis was named The Associated Press’s college basketball player of the year, and Frank Haith capped his first season at Missouri by being named coach of the year.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis was named The Associated Press’s college basketball player of the year, and Frank Haith capped his first season at Missouri by being named coach of the year.

headline.seo: Kentucky’s Anthony Davis Named Player of the Year
headline.main: Davis Named Player of the Year
headline.print_headline: Davis Named Player of the Year
